rooms.description: Large open space for entry and living area, with adherence to Vastu principles ensuring the entrance faces east.
Spacious room oriented towards the south-west as per Vastu for harmonious energy flow. Includes window openings for natural light.
Functional kitchen area placed in the southeast direction for positive energies.
Primary bedroom ensuring north-east facing windows and adequate privacy per Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom positioned towards the south to balance energy flow.
Attached bathroom for master bedroom placed at east corner of ground floor.
Quarters allocated for domestic staff, positioned on the west side as per Vastu recommendations and plot direction.

openings.description: Multiple windows for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Dedicated fitness space in the north-west corner to harness positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
An extra bedroom ensuring balanced distribution of space and adhering to local norms.
Second floor bathroom for the additional bedroom, placed accordingly.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows for ventilation and light.
